message: Once everyone is gone, Granny gets up and moves into the living room.
She sits down on the sofa and lets out a heavy sigh.
I walk over to her.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Granny."

name: タエ
message: "What?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Can we talk a little more?"
She doesn't answer me, but I sit down next to her anyway.
There are so many things I want to ask... but I'm not sure where to start.
My mind is racing and it's hard to string thoughts together.
I look down at my hands folded in my lap and let the words come as they will.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You know, I... I've spent my whole life making you worry, and I never had any idea what you were dealing with. I'm sorry, Granny..."

name: タエ
message: "Don't be stupid."

name: タエ
message: "Aoba, not a day goes by that I'm not thankful you've grown up safe and healthy."

name: タエ
message: "You're my responsibility too. That's what it means to be your grandmother."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Granny..."
Granny looks at me in silence for a moment.

name: タエ
message: "...You said that you remembered Rhyme."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: タエ
message: "A long time ago, you were hospitalized because of Rhyme."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? Because of Rhyme?"

name: タエ
message: "Yeah. Now I can tell you what happened. By the time I got to you, you'd forgotten everything. The doctors and police told me you'd been in a fight."

name: タエ
message: "They said you'd taken a blow to the head, that your memory loss would be temporary... but something happened the day I visited."

name: タエ
message: "Aoba?"

name: 白蒼葉
message: "...Did I startle you?"

name: タエ
message: "When I got there, I found a nurse unconscious beside you..."

name: タエ
message: "You slept for two whole days after that. The nurse didn't remember anything either."

name: タエ
message: "She'd forgotten everything from when she entered your room to the moment she woke up again."

name: タエ
message: "Your headaches started after that."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That much, I remember... though it's all fuzzy after that."

name: タエ
message: "You used Scrap on that nurse. You entered her mind and erased part of her memory."

name: タエ
message: "The headaches, Scrap, the personality changes... I started giving you those pills because I was concerned they might be the start of something more dangerous."

name: タエ
message: "I gauged the dosage to stabilize your mind and keep your powers in check. Your headaches went away for a while, didn't they?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: タエ
message: "But now your powers are coming back. That rebound effect might explain why the medicine isn't working as well anymore."

name: タエ
message: "Scrap is fundamentally a destructive power. But it has the potential to be more than just a weapon. It all depends on how you use it."

name: タエ
message: "And that's why you need to come to terms with it. With who and what you are."

name: タエ
message: "No matter what happens, do not falter. Believe in the path you chose and keep pushing forward."
Her hands clasp mine firmly.
They're soft and warm―the warmth of her kindness, the warmth that has cared for me my whole life.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Granny."

name: タエ
message: "Hm?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I promise I'll come back."

name: タエ
message: "...I know."
She nods and gives me a little smile.
